name: Opbeans
description: Opbeans inventory management system (Elastic APM demo app)

ELASTIC_APM_APP_NAME.description: Elastic APM App Name for the server app

ELASTIC_APM_SECRET_TOKEN.description: Elastic APM Secret Token for the server app

ELASTIC_APM_SERVER_URL.description: Elastic APM Server URL for the server app

WORKLOAD_ELASTIC_APM_APP_NAME.description: Elastic APM App Name for the workload app

WORKLOAD_ELASTIC_APM_SECRET_TOKEN.description: Elastic APM Secret Token for the workload app

WORKLOAD_ELASTIC_APM_SERVER_URL.description: Elastic APM Server URL for the workload app

REACT_APP_OPBEAT_APP_ID.description: Opbeat App Id for the client app

REACT_APP_OPBEAT_ORG_ID.description: Opbeat Organization Id for the client app
